### 3.7(d)
```{r,warning=FALSE}
library(xts)
library(fGarch)
library(rugarch)
da = read.table("data/m-3m4608.txt", header = T)
r = log(1 + da[, 2])
m3 = ugarchfit(ugarchspec(variance.model = list(model = "sGARCH", garchOrder = c(2, 0)),
	mean.model = list(armaOrder = c(1, 1), archm = T)), r)
show(m3)
```
故，可以看出archm的p值0.383553，大于0.05不能拒绝原假设溢价为0。
